name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Application Engineer with over 10 years of experience in robust security practices including Bug Bounty, Pentesting, and vulnerability assessments using tools such as **Burp Suite**, **OWASP**, **SAST**, **DAST**, **SonarQube**, and **Snyk**. Proficient in CI/CD processes utilizing **Jenkins** and **GitLabCI**, and skilled with **Terraform** and **Helm** for infrastructure as code deployments, ensuring high-quality, secure, and scalable applications. Excellent problem-solving and communication skills contribute to effective project execution. Proven experience in designing backend systems for financial platforms and automation tools leveraging **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and deploying on **AWS** and **Azure**. Demonstrated ability to improve security posture and optimize performance while contributing to impactful projects at renowned organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented security best practices to enhance application integrity, utilizing tools such as **Burp Suite**, **SonarQube**, and **Snyk** for continuous vulnerability assessment and remediation.
Conducted penetration testing and security assessments in line with **OWASP** guidelines, ensuring robust application security.
Developed CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins** and **GitLabCI**, achieving a **30%** increase in deployment efficiency and reducing code integration errors by **25%**.
Utilized **Terraform** and **Helm** for infrastructure management, achieving a **20%** reduction in deployment times and maintaining version-controlled infrastructure as code.
Applied Static Application Security Testing (**SAST**) and Dynamic Application Security Testing (**DAST**) to improve secure coding practices and decrease potential vulnerabilities by **40%**.
Effectively collaborated with cross-functional teams to solve complex integration challenges and ensure compliance with industry standards, showcasing strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Utilized **CI/CD** practices with **Jenkins** and **GitLabCI** to enhance the deployment pipeline for the backend systems, increasing deployment frequency by **40%**.
Implemented automated security testing protocols using **SAST**, **DAST**, and tools like **SonarQube** and **Snyk** to identify vulnerabilities, improving code quality and security standards compliance, achieving a **30%** reduction in security-related issues.
Conducted extensive **penetration testing** and security assessments utilizing **Burp Suite** and **OWASP** methodologies, successfully identifying and mitigating risks in application security.
Developed robust backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding processes, and manage complex reporting needs, effectively reducing processing time by **25%**.
Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing for **financial data** and transaction requests for over **200,000** transactions per day.
Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, employing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to ensure consistent and scalable environments, supporting an increase in monthly users from **10,000 to 50,000**.
Engineered data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchanges using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, automating data flow and improving efficiency by **35%**.
Performed comprehensive security audits ensuring compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and secure access control systems.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration and successful release management, enhancing overall project communication and problem-solving strategies.

• Implemented robust security measures throughout the application lifecycle utilizing **Burp Suite**, **OWASP** best practices, and **SonarQube** to identify vulnerabilities and enhance security posture.

• Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins** and **GitLabCI**, ensuring reliable deployments and streamlined collaboration across teams.
• Integrated **Terraform** and **Helm** for streamlined infrastructure management and deployment automation in cloud environments.
• Fostered effective communication across teams and stakeholders to convey technical concepts and solutions, leading to improved project outcomes.
• Streamlined application security through **SAST** and **DAST** methodologies, achieving a security-pass rate of over **95%** in code reviews.
• Drove problem-solving initiatives within the team, resulting in the resolution of critical bugs and the enhancement of application stability by **30%**.
• Collaborated closely with application development teams to establish a **WAF** (Web Application Firewall) that reduced attack vectors by **40%**, protecting user data and enhancing overall system security.
